executiveSummary: Scotty from Fresno, California, pitched his invention, the Copy Keyboard, on Shark Tank, seeking $40,000 for 25% equity. The product automates copy-and-paste tasks to reduce hand fatigue and gained viral attention online. Despite enthusiasm and interest from the sharks, no deal was made.

actionItems.task: Provide enough inventory and reduce product costs
Continue promoting the Copy Keyboard on social media

nextSteps: Scotty will continue independently managing production and sales of the Copy Keyboard while fulfilling pre-orders and potentially seeking other investors or funding opportunities.
